• About

gnaf search

Search for a GNAF address

Created by Alex Leith

About

This is a minimum viable product autocomplete search that covers every address in G-NAF. It's intended to serve as an example of a rapid to develop API and implementation of a system, but it really needs a lot more work.

Features:

  • It uses all open source, including the gnaf loader
  • It uses Here maps as the base (so pretty!)

Issues:

  • It's actually too slow to be much fun. Needs some optimisation.
  • It only has the 'aliases' in there currently, it needs the other 20 million features.
